content.rendered:
Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving.

Corporate Social Responsibility

In collaboration with the government, Rithwik Projects continues to organize workshops for the parents of paralysis patients. Extending financial assistance for the construction and renovation of religious buildings in the Cuddapah District of Andhra Pradesh. 

The construction of 120 houses for poor people in Cuddapah, as well as the construction of approach roads in several villages, Donation of cooking gas connections to the needy in various areas of Rayalaseema and extending financial support for hospital construction in Andhra Pradesh and other states, as well as awarding merit scholarships to deserving students in various parts of Andhra Pradesh. Coordinating school-day activities in Cuddapah Supporting children in Hyderabad and other cities who promote environmentally safe practices.

Commitment

Developing an aesthetically pleasing and sanitary public infrastructure for social and cultural harmony in Andhra Pradesh

Infrastructure

Developing an aesthetically pleasing and sanitary public infrastructure for social and cultural harmony in Andhra Pradesh

Blood Donation

Andhra Pradesh Rotary and Lions Clubs are organizing blood donation drives.

Academic excellence

Honoring outstanding students in rural Andhra for their academic achievements

Construction

In several parts of Andhra Pradesh, low-cost houses with sanitary toilets are being built.

Donation

Sewing machine donations to women to promote economic independence.

Awards & Recognitions

RPPL Group comprises has been recognized on a regional and global level, winning a number of major awards. Here are a few of our honors.

Brands and brand partners

In our experience, we have been build exclusive partnerships with global and internationally superior brands and agencies.

As a trusted and well-established commercial enterprise, RPPL group has proudly partnered with these brands and agencies to introduce them to the India market and beyond. Over the years.
